nur hacker und gaben der fette spast gibt nie uprank

you get punished for having cheaters in your team regardless if your with them or not. bans get thrown out like hotcakes. if your internet goes out for a split second ...banned for 30 minutes and a record of leaving a game. the most broken mechanic is the ranked matchup. there is no such thing as a rank to describe your skill. its based on how well your team is. ubisoft has made zero progress towards improving match ups. its an endless stream of smurfs and boosters. im so sick of this game and i put in so much money so its impossible to quit. fix your shit dont even get me started on the learning curve. money wasted.
